translation.en: I have pineapples! I have strawberry!
translation.fr: J'ai des ananas ! J'ai des fraises !

translation.en: -I have grapes! I have grapefruit! -[bell ringing]
translation.fr: J'ai du raisin ! J'ai du pamplemousse !

translation.en: We had a plan, Carter, and you done goofed it.
The plan's still on.
The plan was for you to get me B's.
-Does this look like a freaking B? -I just want what's best for you.
translation.fr: - C'est un B, ça ?- Je veux le meilleur pour toi.

translation.en: You know when the last time I got an A was?
Okay, I'll act more stupid next time.
Completely moronic and idiotic. Beyond obtuse.
Yeah. Totally.
That's what I'm talking about.
You making fun of me? You're dead this time, Carter.
translation.fr: Tu te payes ma tête ?T'es mort cette fois-ci.

translation.en: [man] What the...
-[barking] -Hey! You go on now, little mutt.
Go on. Go on, dog. I'll turn you into a hot dog. Now, go on.
translation.fr: Va-t'en, ou je te donne aux Chinois !

translation.en: [man] I have grapefruit!
I have pineapples! I have strawberries!
translation.fr: J'ai des ananas ! J'ai des fraises !

translation.en: Thank you very much.
Have a nice day. Be careful with the cars.
translation.fr: Bonne journée. Et attention aux voitures.

translation.en: -You, too. -Okay.
-[Carter] Hey. -[sighs] There you are.
-You're late. Again. -Come on. I wanna go to Sam's.
translation.fr: - Tu es encore en retard.- Viens. On va chez Sam.

translation.en: I was practicing for my recital.
I'm gonna do five pirouettes all on my own.
translation.fr: Je vais faire cinq pirouettes toute seule.

translation.en: -It's called a solo. You know that, right? -That's cool, Frankie.
translation.fr: - Ça s'appelle un solo. Tu savais ?- C'est cool, Frankie.

translation.en: [Frankie] And I'm gonna dance in New York, in Swan Lake, and be crazy famous.
translation.fr: Et je deviendraiune danseuse célèbre à New York.

translation.en: [Carter] But I'll still talk to you.
[Frankie] Why wouldn't you talk to me?
[Carter] Because famous people are always stuck up.
[Frankie] I am not.
And I'm gonna wear my boots to do my pirouettes.
translation.fr: Et je vais danser avec mes bottines.

translation.en: [Carter] Good luck with that.
Hey. You are coming, right?
-To my recital? -Yeah, sure.
If you don't come and Mom has to work, nobody will be there.
translation.fr: Parce que si maman travaille,il n'y aura personne.

translation.en: You'll be great.
I'll be there, Frankie.
I promise.
That is if I invite you.
The tickets are for very important people only.
translation.fr: Les billets sont pour les gens importants.

translation.en: -Come on, let's get in the street car. -No, we can't!
translation.fr: - Viens, on prend le tram.- Non !

translation.en: -You're the one who wanted to go to Sam's. -Wait, Frankie.
translation.fr: - Tu voulais aller chez Sam.- Attends, Frankie.

translation.en: -I wanna walk. -It'll be fine. Come on.
translation.fr: - Je préfère marcher.- Ça va aller. Viens.

translation.en: Why do you have strawberries?
What are you talking about?
I saw you have strawberries in your pocket in the car.
translation.fr: J'ai vu des fraises dans ta poche.

translation.en: [Carter] I don't have any strawberries.
[Frankie] I saw something red and green.
[Carter] I don't have any strawberries in my pocket.
translation.fr: J'ai pas de fraises dans la poche.

translation.en: [Frankie] Well, it smeared on the chair and you didn't wipe it up.
translation.fr: Ça s'est écrasé sur le siège.

translation.en: [Frankie] What do you mean you don't believe me?
[Carter] You're gonna fly to Paris to dance? Not gonna happen.
translation.fr: Tu vas aller danser à Paris ? Tu rêves.

translation.en: [Frankie] It will happen. I know it.
You know you need to punch Pig-Face in the face, right?
translation.fr: Tu dois casser la figure à Face de Porc.

translation.en: -Frankie... I don't care. -He'll bully you your whole life.
translation.fr: - Je m'en fiche.- Il te harcèlera toujours.

translation.en: [Carter] I'm not gonna fight back. I'd lose.
translation.fr: Je ne me battrai pas. Je perdrais.

translation.en: [Frankie] Why are we going here again? It's just a waste of time.
translation.fr: Pourquoi on revient là ?On perd notre temps.

translation.en: [Carter] Because you never know, it could change sometimes.
translation.fr: On ne sait jamais, ça pourrait changer.

translation.en: -Maybe he's in a good mood today. -In your dreams.
translation.fr: - Il peut être de bonne humeur.- Tu parles.

translation.en: [Carter] Hi, Mr. King. We're here for the watch.
translation.fr: Bonjour, M. King. On vient pour la montre.

translation.en: [Carter] $4 and 26, 27, 28 cents.
translation.fr: On a quatre dollars et 26, 27, 28 cents.

translation.en: That brings the total to $34 and 18... No, 19 cents.
translation.fr: Ce qui fait un totalde 34 $ et 18... Non, 19 cents.

translation.en: Not bad, am I right?
-How much more do we have to go? -Oh, you don't even wanna know.
translation.fr: - Il faut combien encore ?- Je préfère pas vous dire.

translation.en: -[Frankie sighs] -[Carter] Mr. King,
we've been coming here twice a week for a long time.
translation.fr: on vient là deux fois par semainedepuis des lustres.

translation.en: You can at least take the watch out of the "For Sale" case.
translation.fr: Vous pourriez enleverla montre de la vitrine.

translation.en: Please. He meant to say please.
translation.fr: Il voulait dire s'il vous plaît.

translation.en: I take it out of the case, people can't see it.
translation.fr: Si je l'enlève, on la verra plus.

translation.en: People can't see it, people can't buy it.
But we're gonna buy it. Eventually.
Listen, I told both of you when we started this whole cockamamieness,
translation.fr: Je vous ai dit dès le débutde cette ridicule histoire

translation.en: that if somebody wants the watch, I'll let you know.
translation.fr: que si j'ai un acheteur, je vous le dirai.

translation.en: -Give you a chance to buy it first. -Yeah, but we should have--
translation.fr: - Vous aurez la priorité.- Mais on devrait...

translation.en: [Sam] There's no buts.
When I bought it from your mother, I paid her good money.
translation.fr: Je l'ai payée un bon prix à votre mère.

translation.en: This is a business. Barely, but it is.
Mr. King, I promise you'll get money. We're at, like, $34 and 19 cents.
translation.fr: Je vous promets de trouver l'argent.On a déjà 34 $ et 19 cents.

translation.en: -Baby, you see how old I am? -Old.
translation.fr: - Tu sais quel âge j'ai ?- Oui.

translation.en: A hundred?
You're not really helping your case.
The point is, at this rate, you guys will be bringing my money to the cemetery.
translation.fr: À ce rythme-là, je serai au cimetièrequand vous m'aurez remboursé.

translation.en: I don't like the cemetery.
Listen, a guy came in, he liked the watch. I told him it ran slow.
translation.fr: J'ai un client à qui la montre a plu.J'ai dit qu'elle retardait.

translation.en: It doesn't run slow.
My father kept it in perfect condition, and you know that.
translation.fr: Mon père l'entretenait parfaitement,vous le savez bien.

translation.en: The point is, pudding head, he's not wearing it, is he?
translation.fr: Mais il ne la porte pas,pas vrai, petit malin ?

translation.en: Mr. King, of all the people I don't like in this world,
translation.fr: M. King, de toutes les personnesque je déteste,

translation.en: I like you the best.
You and every other woman in my life.
translation.fr: Toi et toutes les femmes de ma vie.

translation.en: Now, you two, get out of here.
-We're just gonna keep coming back. -Yeah, like a rash.
translation.fr: - On reviendra sans arrêt.- Comme l'eczéma.

translation.en: -See ya tomorrow. -Take care.
-[Frankie] That was a waste of time. -No, it wasn't. We added more money.
translation.fr: - On perd notre temps.- Non. On a ajouté de l'argent.

translation.en: Next time, it'll be less money that we have to add.
translation.fr: On en aura de moins en moins à ajouter.

translation.en: [Frankie] Yeah, yeah, yeah.
You've been giving Mr. King your lunch money. I know you have.
translation.fr: C'est ton argent de cantineque tu lui donnes.

translation.en: [Carter] Maybe I wouldn't have to if Mom hadn't sold Dad's watch.
translation.fr: Maman n'avait qu'à pas vendrela montre de papa.

translation.en: Lots of things aren't very good in life. Get used to it.
translation.fr: La vie n'est pas toujours rose.Habitue-toi.

translation.en: You get used to being grounded forever or longer when Mom finds out.
translation.fr: Et toi, tu seras privé de sortiequand maman saura ça.

translation.en: [Frankie] I was here first.
[Carter] I'm older, so it doesn't matter. I'm always first.
translation.fr: Je suis l'aîné.Je suis toujours le premier.

translation.en: Mom doesn't like it when you double dip.
Mom's not here, so if you just shut your mouth for once, you'll be fine.
translation.fr: Elle est pas là, alors boucle-la,et tout ira bien.

translation.en: Fine. I can keep my mouth shut so much that I'll never talk to you
translation.fr: Très bien. Je la boucle. Je ne te parlerai

translation.en: for all the time in all the universes in all the world.
translation.fr: plus jamais de toute ma vie.

translation.en: [Carter] Thank goodness.
Carter can't come to the phone right now.
Please don't leave a message after the beep. Beep!
translation.fr: Ne laissez pas de messageaprès le bip. Bip !

translation.en: Just look!
If you are satisfied with your message, please press "1" or hang up.
translation.fr: Pressez "1" pour écouter votre message,sinon raccrochez.

translation.en: Carter, just listen to me!
What?
No way.
I can't believe it. How did you even get up here?
translation.fr: C'est dingue. Comment tu es arrivé là ?

translation.en: [Frankie] You know this dog?
[Carter] I was trying to get him to follow us home from school.
translation.fr: J'ai tout fait pour qu'il nous suive.

translation.en: -I knew you were doing something not good. -Come on. Good boy.
translation.fr: - Je savais que tu mijotais un truc.- Là, mon grand.

translation.en: Come here. Good boy.
-What's your name, bud? -He's a stray.
translation.fr: - Il a un nom ?- C'est un chien errant.

translation.en: Where did you come from?
A trash can?
He smells worse than your side of the room.
translation.fr: Il pue encore plus que ton lit.

translation.en: You're right. Let's fix it.
translation.fr: Tu as raison. On va arranger ça.

translation.en: [folk song playing] ♪ I love my dog as much as I love you ♪
translation.fr: J'aime mon chien autant que toi

translation.en: ♪ But you may fade My dog will always come through ♪
translation.fr: Mais si tu disparaisMon chien reviendra toujours

translation.en: ♪ All the pay I need Comes shining through his eyes ♪
translation.fr: La lumière de ses yeux me suffit

translation.en: ♪ I don't need no cold water To make me realize ♪
translation.fr: Pas besoin d'eau froide pour comprendre

translation.en: ♪ That I love my dog As much as I love you ♪
translation.fr: Que j'aime mon chien autant que toi

translation.en: ♪ But you may fade My dog will always come through ♪
translation.fr: Mais si tu disparaisMon chien reviendra toujours

translation.en: Carter, what are we gonna do about Mom?
translation.fr: Carter, on fait quoi pour maman ?

translation.en: What about her?
She's gonna freak out.
You asked for a bulldog for Christmas, and you got a stuffed animal.
translation.fr: Tu as demandé un bulldog à Noël,tu as eu une peluche.

translation.en: Which is why we're not gonna tell her. He's just gonna stay in our room for now.
translation.fr: On lui dira rien.Il va rester dans notre chambre.

translation.en: Where's he gonna pee and poo?
In your bed?
Carter!
Just until I can convince her.
It's Mom. We'll never convince her. Like, ever.
translation.fr: C'est maman. On ne la convaincra jamais.

translation.en: -Oh, crap. -Oh, no.
Hey, hey!
Where are my two favorite people that help Mom out?
translation.fr: Où sont mes deux loulous préféréspour m'aider ?

translation.en: -[Carter] Hey, Mom. -Hi, Mommy!
You're the best mommy of all the mommies in all the world!
translation.fr: Tu es la meilleure maman du monde !

translation.en: [Carter] Definitely, you're the best.
What'd you break?
[both] Nothing.
[Whitney] So there were four accidents today. Four!
translation.fr: Il y a eu quatre accidents aujourd'hui.

translation.en: I was driving the ambulance 80 miles per hour.
[Carter] That's a lot, Mom.
[Whitney] Forks on the left, hon.
-Car, is all your homework done? -[Carter] It will be.
Here you go, Madame. Mushrooms on top.
How about you, Mr. Man. Anything exciting happen at school today?
translation.fr: Et toi ? Un truc chouetteà l'école aujourd'hui ?

translation.en: Pig-Face happened.
Your death is about to happen.
[Whitney] Again? That's the third time. Okay, that's it. I'm calling the school.
translation.fr: Encore ? C'est la troisième fois.Je vais appeler l'école.

translation.en: Don't blow this up like you blow everything up.
translation.fr: N'en fais pas un drame, comme d'habitude.

translation.en: I'm not blowing anything up.
I wanna know who this kid is.
I told you, Pig-Face.
-Can you butt out, Frankie? -Carter, what happened? Tell me the truth.
translation.fr: - Tu peux me lâcher ?- Que s'est-il passé ? Dis-moi la vérité.

translation.en: -Carter, just-- -You don't wanna know the truth.
-[Carter whispers] No. -[Whitney] Straight up, Carter.
-Are you scared of this kid? -No.
translation.fr: - tu as peur de lui ?- Non.

translation.en: [Whitney] 'Cause if you are, that's nothing...
-Go. -...to be ashamed of.
-[Whitney] Just let me help you. -[chuckles] No. No.
Here you go. No mushrooms.
Um, actually, can I have mushrooms, please?
-You hate mushrooms. -But taste buds change every seven years.
translation.fr: - Tu détestes ça.- Les papilles changent tous les sept ans.

translation.en: -That's a scientific fact. -He's right. Very, very right.
[Whitney] Mushrooms.
Okay.
I'm just worried about you, Carter.
-You're worried about everything. -That is not true.
translation.fr: - Tu t'inquiètes pour tout.- C'est faux.

translation.en: Okay, maybe that is a little bit true. A little bit.
translation.fr: Bon, peut-être un peu. Un petit peu.

translation.en: Anyway, here you go.
What is going on with you guys?
-Nothing. -Nothing.
I feel like you're hiding something from me.
Okay. Mom, let's just calm down and eat our food.
-[sighs] -Okay, I...
I know that things have been hard,
translation.fr: je sais que c'est dur en ce moment,

translation.en: and you guys wake up in the morning and I'm already at work,
translation.fr: je suis déjà partie quand vous vous levez,

translation.en: and you've been on your own a lot lately.
But I just want you to know that you can talk to me, you know?
translation.fr: Mais vous pouvez me parler, d'accord ?

translation.en: Really, I'm right here. [chuckles]
We do talk to you, Mom.
Don't worry.
We love you, Mom, to the moon and back.
translation.fr: On t'aime, maman, jusqu'à la lune.

translation.en: To the moon and back.
[Carter] This is the Aitken Basin, formed 4.5 billion years ago,
translation.fr: Voici le bassin Aitken,formé il y a 4,5 milliards d'années,

translation.en: which in dog years is a lot.
My dad showed it to me on an electron telescope
translation.fr: Mon père me l'a montré au télescope,

translation.en: at the planetarium he ran.
Wanna know something more interesting?
translation.fr: Tu veux voir un truc mieux ?

translation.en: This is my favorite ballerina book. Isn't she pretty?
translation.fr: Mon livre de danse préféré.Elle est jolie ?

translation.en: -Hey, stop chewing on that. -[whines]
And this is the Nutcracker.
It's about an evil rat king.
translation.fr: Ça parle d'un méchant Roi des Rats.

translation.en: -Die, Rat King, die. -[barks]
Mom will hear you.
Hey, what if we named him Michael Jordan?
translation.fr: Et si on l'appelait Michael Jordan ?

translation.en: That's the dumbest name for a dog I've ever heard.
Okay. What about Copernicus?
What is going on in your mind? No.
This is my favorite, Sleeping Beauty. There's a lot of kissing.
translation.fr: Mon préféré, La Belle au bois dormant.Y a plein de bisous.

translation.en: [Carter] Look, Benjamin Franklin had a dog.
He thought they were more reliable than people.
translation.fr: Il les trouvait plus fiables que les gens.

translation.en: That's not very interesting.
Yeah, but what about Benjamin, as his name?
Mmm... What about Benji?
He does look kind of like a Benji. He's old and new at the same time.
translation.fr: Ça lui va bien.Il a l'air ni jeune ni vieux.

translation.en: -[Frankie] Yeah. -[whines softly]
Good boy. Good boy.
[Carter] Dad would let us keep Benji.
translation.fr: Papa nous autoriserait à le garder.

translation.en: I don't wanna say goodbye to Benji.
translation.fr: je veux pas dire au revoir à Benji.

translation.en: I don't like goodbye.
Promise me we won't have to.
Hey, I promise you, Fritter.
[Frankie] I love you, guys.
[Carter] I love you too, Frankie.
[Frankie] And now I lay me down to sleep,
I pray the Lord for this dog to keep.
translation.fr: je prie Dieu pour qu'on garde ce chien.

translation.en: And that I will do incredible at my recital.
translation.fr: Et pour que je déchireau spectacle de danse.

translation.en: And that my spelling teacher will quit her job forever and never come back.
translation.fr: Et pour que la prof d'orthographedémissionne.

translation.en: And that Mommy will not have to worry so much.
translation.fr: Et pour que maman ne s'inquiète pas trop.

translation.en: And that I'll never have to eat any more mushrooms as long as I live.
translation.fr: Et pour que je n'aie plus jamaisà manger de champignons.

translation.en: Good night, Benji.
[Whitney] I don't know what to do, you know?
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas quoi faire.

translation.en: They're getting so big, and they're so smart,
and they catch on to things and...
And I'm trying to keep everything together.
translation.fr: je tiens tout à bout de bras.

translation.en: It's like I'm nothing but a nag.
All of a sudden, I'm so serious.
translation.fr: Je suis trop sérieuse tout d'un coup.

translation.en: Every day I feel like I'm messing them up and letting them down.
translation.fr: J'ai l'impression de les déboussoleret de ne pas être là pour eux.

translation.en: I don't know how to be in three places at once.
translation.fr: J'arrive pas à êtreà trois endroits en même temps.

translation.en: So, feel free to give me some advice
or one of your lame science jokes, or...
translation.fr: ou une de tes blagues pourriesde scientifique, ou...

translation.en: a carton of ice cream and bingeing...
translation.fr: une grosse boîte de crème glacée...

translation.en: 'cause I could really use it. [sniffles]
[Whitney] Just a quick kiss before I go to work.
-Carter? -Good morning, Mom.
What is that?
A stuffed animal. [stammers] An animatronic one.
[sighs] Okay. All right. I'm on to you two.
This is why you guys were being weird last night.
He's cute. Mom, look at him.
[sighs] You know what? I expected Carter to lie to me
because he's almost a teenager, but you?
translation.fr: c'est presque un ado, mais toi ?

translation.en: Mom, we're not lying. We just didn't tell you yet.
translation.fr: On ment pas. On allait te le dire.

translation.en: Where did he come from?
Uh, he kind of found me.
On the street, we saved him.
translation.fr: Dans la rue, on l'a sauvé.

translation.en: [Whitney] On the street?
No. Okay.
-[whimpers] -All right, I got it.
You're cute, but you are a dog and you poop everywhere,
translation.fr: Tu es mignon, mais tu es un chien,tu fais tes besoins partout,

translation.en: and you mess everything up, you chew on things,
translation.fr: tu mets le bazar, tu bouffes tout,

translation.en: you keep us up at night.
He loves you, Mommy.
No. Okay? I can barely keep the three of us afloat.
translation.fr: Non. J'ai déjà du mal à nous gérer.

translation.en: It's not happening.
Mom, you don't have to worry. We'll take care of him.
translation.fr: Maman, ne t'inquiète pas.On s'en occupera nous-mêmes.

translation.en: I don't have the money or the time.
translation.fr: Je n'ai ni les moyens ni le temps.

translation.en: It's not happening. I'm taking him to a shelter.
translation.fr: Pas question. Je l'emmène au chenil.

translation.en: They murder-kill dogs there. You can't take him there.
translation.fr: Ils tuent les chiens là-bas.Ne fais pas ça.

translation.en: -No, they don't. -[Carter] Are you kidding me?
A shelter?
They won't even give him three days.
translation.fr: Il ne vivra même pas trois jours.

translation.en: I won't let them hurt him.
translation.fr: Je les laisserai pas faire ça.

translation.en: [Carter] Yeah, you will. You don't care.
He's a good boy, and you won't even give him a chance.
translation.fr: Il est gentilet tu lui laisses aucune chance.

translation.en: Carter, no, okay?
I'm sorry... I don't...
I can't take care of one more thing right now.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas gérer un truc de plus.

translation.en: He's not a thing. He's Benji.
translation.fr: C'est pas un truc. C'est Benji.

translation.en: You named him?
I'm so sorry that you can't handle one more thing right now,
translation.fr: Désolé que tu puisses pas gérerun truc de plus,

translation.en: but what about us?
We take care of each other,
so I'm pretty sure that we can handle a dog.
translation.fr: alors on peut veiller sur lui.

translation.en: Maybe he'll make things fun around here for once.
translation.fr: Et puis, ce sera peut-êtreun peu plus marrant par ici.

translation.en: Oh, I forgot. That's not allowed, either.
Carter, no... That's not fair.
-Just leave us alone. -[Benji whines]
I don't even like that stupid dog.
translation.fr: Je n'aime même pas ce stupide chien.

translation.en: Mom won't let you stay.
You'll wind up in a pound.
translation.fr: Tu vas finir à la fourrière.

translation.en: Just go.
Go, please.
I love you, Benji.
[melancholy song playing] ♪ If your heart believes in dreamin' ♪
translation.fr: Si ton cœur croit aux rêves

translation.en: ♪ There's no other place I know ♪
translation.fr: Je ne connais pas d'autre endroit

translation.en: ♪ Well, life here rolls on by Without a care for tomorrow ♪
translation.fr: La vie passe sans penser au lendemain

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, that was the life for me That was the life for me ♪
translation.fr: C'était la vie que je voulais

translation.en: ♪ How long must I travel On this journey? ♪
♪ Guess I'll count a million stars Along the way ♪
♪ And every time I start to worry ♪
♪ Something whispers in my ear ♪
translation.fr: Quelque chose me murmure à l'oreille

translation.en: ♪ Says the words I long to hear ♪
♪ Almost home ♪
♪ I'm almost home ♪
translation.fr: Je suis presque à la maison

translation.en: ♪ Might be lost and afraid ♪
translation.fr: Je suis perdu et j'ai peur

translation.en: ♪ But I'm just a dream away ♪
♪ I'm almost home ♪
translation.fr: Je suis presque à la maison

translation.en: ♪ Just one more mile And I'll be home free ♪
translation.fr: Un kilomètre de plusEt je serai à la maison, libre

translation.en: ♪ Just one more day Is all my heart needs ♪
translation.fr: Mon cœur n'a besoin que d'un jour

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get there ♪
♪ Yeah, I'm gonna get there someday ♪
♪ Feel so cold and alone But I'm... ♪
translation.fr: J'ai froid et je suis seulMais je...

translation.en: ♪ I'm almost home ♪
translation.fr: Je suis presque à la maison

translation.en: -[Frankie] Did you not eat lunch again? -[Carter] I ate lunch.
-Then how come you got more money for Sam? -I don't.
translation.fr: - Alors, d'où vient l'argent ?- J'en ai pas.

translation.en: Then how come we're going to Sam's?
To get my money back.
If you get our money back, how do we get Dad's watch back?
translation.fr: Comment on ferapour la montre de papa alors ?

translation.en: Mom doesn't care. She wouldn't let us keep Benji.
translation.fr: Maman s'en fiche. Elle veut pas de Benji.

translation.en: Why should I care about getting her the watch back?
translation.fr: Alors, pourquoi je lui ferais plaisir ?

translation.en: Because we're a family.
[sighs] Whatever.
You're just scared of somebody else buying it.
translation.fr: Tu as peur qu'un autre l'achète.

translation.en: I'm not scared. I'm realistic, Frankie.
translation.fr: J'ai pas peur. Je suis réaliste.

translation.en: I told you she wouldn't let us keep him.
You're not real or listic or whatever. You're just chicken.
translation.fr: Tu n'es ni rat ni liste, tu es lâche.

translation.en: You give up at everything when not very good things happen.
translation.fr: Tu laisses tomberdès que ça devient difficile.

translation.en: -Mr. King, we need to talk. -...hold up.
Hey, you kids, I sold the watch.
translation.fr: Les enfants, j'ai vendu la montre.

translation.en: You two go on back home now.
-You what? -Sold the watch.
You sold the watch? That's not right.
-Y'all go on now. Go home. -You know what?
translation.fr: - Rentrez chez vous.- Vous savez quoi ?

translation.en: I'm gonna call the police and tell them you are a lying liar.
translation.fr: Je vais dire à la policeque vous êtes un menteur.

translation.en: You can't sell the watch.
translation.fr: Vous ne pouvez pas la vendre.

translation.en: -How y'all doing? -[both gasp]
Now, I remember being a kid.
translation.fr: J'ai été un enfant moi aussi.

translation.en: I used to tell my brother there I was gonna beat him with a baseball bat,
translation.fr: Je menaçais mon frèrede l'éclater avec une batte,

translation.en: but I didn't really mean it.
When you say you're gonna go get the police,
translation.fr: Quand tu disque tu vas aller voir la police,

translation.en: that's just you being a kid, right?
[shudders] Yeah, just talking.
translation.fr: Oui, je disais ça comme ça.

translation.en: Good, but just in case, y'all are gonna stick around for a while.
translation.fr: Bien. Mais au cas où,vous allez rester là un moment.

translation.en: [Sam] Man, you don't need to handle kids like that.
translation.fr: Pas la peine de les brutaliser comme ça.

translation.en: -[Syd] Shh. -[Carter] Let go.
[Sam] You don't have to do that. Leave 'em alone!
[Syd] Open the safe. Fill the bag. Do it.
-Not until you let them kids go. -Mr. Pawn Man,
translation.fr: - Relâchez les enfants.- M. le prêteur,

translation.en: put yourself in the shoes of two fellas who would come in here wearing
these ridiculous masks. Do I look like I'm playing?
Open the safe! Hurry up.
Y'all calm down.
-Open up the safe, now! -Don't hurt them kids.
translation.fr: - Le coffre !- Ne leur faites pas de mal.

translation.en: Do it, before I hop that counter
and slap the taste out your mouth. Come on, hurry up!
translation.fr: te faire passer l'envie de parler. Vite !

translation.en: Speed it up. Come on!
[Sam] Comin'.
You got what you came for. Now go on.
translation.fr: Vous avez ce que vous vouliez. Partez.

translation.en: Tie him up. Let's go.
Move. Come on, back door.
-[Sam] Man, wait. -Tie him up.
-Where you taking them kids? -Move! The backdoor. Go. Get out.
translation.fr: - Vous les emmenez où ?- Par derrière. Sortez.

translation.en: Sit down. Sit down. Sit down.
[Carter grunts] Let us go.
Y'all gonna sit here, stay quiet for ten minutes,
translation.fr: Vous allez rester sagement assis là

translation.en: and then forget any of this ever happened.
If you don't, me and my brother will pay a little visit to your home. Understand?
translation.fr: Sinon, mon frère et moi,on viendra chez vous. Compris ?

translation.en: -[grunts] Help! -Hurry up.
-[Sam] Over here! -Mr. King!
[Carter] Frankie, stop!
Get up. Get up.
-[Frankie] Help! Help us! -[Carter] Let us go!
-[Syd] Get in the van. -[Frankie] Carter? [screams]
-[Titus] Wait. What are you doing? -They saw my face.
translation.fr: - Tu fais quoi ?- Ils ont vu mon visage.

translation.en: -Help! Someone, help us! -[Titus] They kids.
Now they've seen your face, too. Get in the van.
translation.fr: Ils ont vu ton visage aussi. Monte.

translation.en: Please let us go.
-We didn't do anything. -Go on. Get in the van.
Please.
Help! Help!
Damn.
Is that your dog?
-[man] Easy! -[horn blaring]
Get out the way!
-You get this is kidnapping, right? -It's more like saving our butts.
translation.fr: - C'est un enlèvement !- Je sauve notre peau !

translation.en: -[cell phone ringing] -Find the phone, Titus. Hurry up.
-Mommy! -Get rid of it.
-Get it out the window, idiot. -I'm getting it! [grunts]
translation.fr: - Par la fenêtre, idiot.- C'est bon !

translation.en: [Titus] Please stop.
[Syd] We in too deep now, brother. We can't do that.
translation.fr: On n'a plus le choix. Impossible.

translation.en: He's gone.
-[Titus] Stop driving! -We can't stop!
-[Titus] We can stop! -No, we can't!
[Titus] Syd, where are you taking us?
[Syd] Don't worry. I got this covered, I promise.
translation.fr: T'en fais pas. Je me charge de tout.

translation.en: Why are you so ugly?
Wanna say that again?
Hey! What are you doing back there?
Nothing. It's just my lunch.
-[Titus] What is that? -Do not take your eye off of him.
Don't you never call me ugly. Never!
translation.fr: Ne redis jamais que je suis laid. Jamais !

translation.en: Hurry up. Hurry up. Hurry up.
Tie 'em up in that back room.
-[Syd] Hurry up. -[Carter grunts] Let me go!
-Double knots. Put the tarp on the van. -[Titus] They ain't going anywhere.
translation.fr: - Double nœuds. Cache le fourgon.- Ils n'iront nulle part.

translation.en: Give me your hands.
Please.
I'm almost done with my shift, and I haven't heard from you guys.
translation.fr: J'ai presque fini,et j'ai pas de nouvelles.

translation.en: I know that you're mad at me, but you have to tell me where you are.
translation.fr: Vous êtes fâchés,mais dites-moi où vous êtes.

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry.
And I love you.
So call me, okay?
What'd you pick this place for? Gives me the creeps.
translation.fr: Pourquoi cet endroit ?Il me fout la trouille.

translation.en: So nobody comes sniffing around.
translation.fr: Personne viendra y fourrer son nez.

translation.en: -What're you doing, man? -Checking our score.
translation.fr: - Que fais-tu ?- Je compte le butin.

translation.en: I mean with them. I didn't sign up for no kidnapping.
translation.fr: Avec eux.J'ai pas signé pour un enlèvement.

translation.en: Let me make something real clear to you.
There are people that want money from us,
but we ain't got no money, do we?
So they gonna break every bone in our body instead.
translation.fr: Alors, on va se faire démonter.

translation.en: That what you signed up for?
I don't owe those people nothing. That's all you.
translation.fr: Je leur dois rien, moi. C'est toi.

translation.en: Who took care of you seven years, huh?
translation.fr: Je me suis occupé de toi pendant 7 ans.

translation.en: Food, clothes, all that?
I was the one who figured out a way
for us to keep on even when our own parents wouldn't.
translation.fr: de survivrequand nos parents voulaient plus.

translation.en: What I owe, you owe.
-All right. So what's the plan? -Sell all this, pay off our debt.
translation.fr: - D'accord. Quel est le plan ?- Vendre ça et rembourser nos dettes.

translation.en: Keep them around in case we need a get-out-of-jail-free card.
translation.fr: Garder ces deux-làpour pouvoir nous enfuir.

translation.en: And then what?
And then we no longer need 'em.
She's cold.
[Syd] So what?
-So what? -I like this here watch.
translation.fr: - Et alors ?- Cette montre me plaît.

translation.en: A lot.
It actually reminds me of a watch my daddy had.
translation.fr: Elle me rappelle celle de mon père.

translation.en: Give it back!
Was this the reason y'all was in the shop today?
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que vous étiez au magasin ?

translation.en: "To the man of my dreams.
I love you more than the moon and the stars.
translation.fr: Je t'aime plus fortque la lune et les étoiles.

translation.en: Love, W." That's nice.
translation.fr: Avec tout mon amour. W." Sympa.

translation.en: Let me work this here.
Your daddy run off. Got sick and tired of you, your old mama.
translation.fr: Votre père s'est tiré.Il en a eu marre de vous et de votre mère.

translation.en: So she sold it. It's good riddance.
But then, y'all want a little something something to remember him by.
translation.fr: Mais vous voulez un souvenir de lui.

translation.en: Ain't that right, little man?
Tell me how bad you want it.
Come on. Tell me.
It's yours, ain't it?
You can take it from me.
Take it. Take it.
What you scared of?
You're a little coward, huh?
translation.fr: Tu es un peu lâche, hein ?

translation.en: Just like your old man.
Sic, Rott! Sic him!
-[Titus] We okay? -You, too, dumbo.
Go. Go!
Dumb move, dog.
Where are you?
Help!
Day keeps getting better.
Little doggie.
Where you at, baby boy?
Come out and play.
Little doggie.
Where are you?
I'm gonna skin you alive.
Gonna wipe that stupid grin off your face.
Where you at?
Benji!
Come here, boy. Get this. Please, get this.
Good boy.
I hate that dog!
-[Carter] Please, Benji, hurry. -It's stuck. He can't get it.
translation.fr: - Vite, Benji.- C'est coincé. Il y arrive pas.

translation.en: -[Carter] Please, Benji. -Come on!
-[gasps] -Where is he?
[Syd] Oh, I think Rottie smells him.
-Where could he be? -[both gasp]
-Get him, Rott. -[Carter] No!
Run, Benji, run!
-[growling] -[Carter] Don't hurt him!
Run, Benji!
[Sam] Help! Get me out of here.
Hey, who is that?
-[panting] -Is that a dog?
What are you doing in here?
Puppy, bark for me!
Where'd you go, puppy? Come on, puppy.
Where'd you go? I know you're out there.
translation.fr: Où es-tu ? Je sais que tu es là.

translation.en: What are you doing out there?
Come on, puppy. Come on, puppy. Come on.
Hey, puppy, come on back now.
What're you...
Are you trying to get the lock?
Come on, puppy, you can do it! I know you can.
translation.fr: Vas-y, tu peux y arriver ! Je le sais.

translation.en: Come on, pup. Don't leave me now. Don't give up, puppy.
translation.fr: Me laisse pas tomber. Tiens bon.

translation.en: Come on, baby. I know you can do it. Come on, puppy. You almost got it. Get it.
Come on, pup. Come on, I know you can do it.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu peux y arriver.

translation.en: Puppy, thank you! You opened the door!
translation.fr: Merci, mon chien ! Tu as ouvert la porte !

translation.en: Yes, yes, hey. Good boy.
Wait. Where's Carter and Frankie?
translation.fr: Attends. Où sont Carter et Frankie ?

translation.en: [Lyle] Yes, sir. I'll keep you posted. Yeah.
translation.fr: Oui, chef. Je vous tiens au courant.

translation.en: Sam King? Sam King?
Detective Lyle Burton. How you doing?
-Hey. Listen. You got to find the kids. -Trust me, we're gonna find them.
translation.fr: - Il faut retrouver les enfants.- Croyez-moi, on va les retrouver.

translation.en: Did you see what the guys look like?
-No, they were wearing-- -I got something.
translation.fr: - Non, ils portaient...- J'ai trouvé ça.

translation.en: Okay. Hold on for a second, okay? What you got? What you got?
I found it out back.
-Sam! Where's Frankie and Carter? -[Sam] Lord, Ms. Hughes, I'm so sorry.
translation.fr: - Sam ! Où sont Frankie et Carter ?- Mme Hughes, je suis désolé.

translation.en: -What happened? -Ms. Hughes, I'm Detective Lyle Burton.
-We're gonna do everything we can-- -Why were they even here?
translation.fr: - On va tout faire...- Que faisaient-ils ici ?

translation.en: -It's the watch. -The watch?
Your husband's watch.
The kids have been coming in every day almost trying to buy it back.
translation.fr: Ils viennent presque tous les jourspour essayer de la racheter.

translation.en: I told them that I sold it. I didn't know that they'd come in here to...
translation.fr: Je leur ai dit que je l'avais vendue.J'ignorais qu'ils viendraient...

translation.en: -Hey! What... -Get him. What...
-What is he doing here? -That dog saved me.
translation.fr: - Que fait-il ici ?- Il m'a sauvé.

translation.en: -Is he yours? -No. What... He what?
translation.fr: - Il est à vous ?- Non. Il a quoi ?

translation.en: He got me out of the dang closet they locked me in.
translation.fr: Il m'a sorti du placardoù j'étais enfermé.

translation.en: [Lyle] We need to follow procedure, okay?
[Sam] I think he's trying to tell you something.
translation.fr: Il essaie de vous dire quelque chose.

translation.en: Ms. Hughes! Ms. Hughes!
Stay put. Requesting backup. I got a 2-12 on foot.
translation.fr: Bougez pas. Renforts demandés.J'ai un 2-12 piéton.

translation.en: [woman on radio] Suspect identification?
Uh, brown hair, 35 pounds, four legs.
You wanna repeat that, Burton?
Not especially.
[woman] We're parked down there.
[Lyle] Ms. Hughes, let me do my job.
I'm following that dog.
[Lyle] Listen, we'll find them.
-We will follow the dog. Just come on. -Fine. Let's go.
translation.fr: - On va le suivre. Venez.- D'accord.

translation.en: -Hey, hold up, hold up. -[Whitney] Sam?
About to catch a heart attack.
Get in the car. Let's go!
Hey, hey. No, no, no, you wait. Wait here. I got it.
translation.fr: Non. Attendez ici. Je m'en occupe.

translation.en: Must be out of my doggoned mind.
translation.fr: Je dois avoir perdu la tête.

translation.en: The heck you sniffing around for?
What you got?
What? What is that?
Pudding? Does it look like I want pudding?
translation.fr: Tu crois que j'ai envie de manger ?

translation.en: -[barks] -What will I do with that?
Is that why you brought us here?
Okay. [sighs]
And then you walk off. Great.
translation.fr: Et maintenant, tu te tires. Super.

translation.en: Stop. Just stop.
No, stop. Just stop!
Do you have any idea how much time I've wasted?
My kids are... [sighs]
I don't wanna see you ever again. Go.
translation.fr: Je ne veux plus jamais te voir. Pars.

translation.en: Do you hear me? Go!
What the heck were you thinking, Street? We got procedure, son.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui vous a pris, Burton ?Il y a une procédure.

translation.en: Sir, I know. I got carried away.
Ms. Hughes? Here's a cup of jasmine tea. It manifests good fortune.
translation.fr: Mme Hughes ? Une tasse de thé au jasmin.Ça porte chance.

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
How much money had they saved up?
It doesn't matter. I should've given them the watch back.
translation.fr: Peu importe.J'aurais dû leur rendre la montre.

translation.en: No, I never should have sold it.
translation.fr: Je n'aurais pas dû la vendre.

translation.en: I should've done something
so they didn't think that buying a watch would make it all okay.
translation.fr: pour que racheter la montrene soit pas nécessaire à leurs yeux.

translation.en: The honest truth is, Ms. Hughes...
I didn't give the watch back, 'cause I like having 'em come in.
translation.fr: je ne l'ai pas rendue,car j'aimais bien les voir.

translation.en: Those two, they got nothing but love in 'em.
-I got something. -It's Carter's.
translation.fr: - J'ai quelque chose.- C'est à Carter.

translation.en: A traffic cop found it.
No usable prints, but it's a starting point, location-wise.
translation.fr: Pas d'empreintes,mais c'est un début de localisation.

translation.en: Hey, come on. Give me my phone back.
Don't eat the rubber ducky. Give me that back. Good boy. Good boy.
translation.fr: Mange pas le canard en plastique.Rends-le-moi. Bon chien.

translation.en: -Who's a good boy? -[Frankie] What's his name, anyways?
translation.fr: - Bon chien.- C'est quoi, son nom ?

translation.en: [Carter] I don't think he has one. He's a stray.
translation.fr: Il en a pas. C'est un chien errant.

translation.en: Hey, where did you come from, buddy? Do you need a home?
translation.fr: D'où tu viens ? Tu cherches une famille ?

translation.en: [Frankie] What are you thinking? What if Mom finds out?
translation.fr: Ça va pas ? Et si maman l'apprend ?

translation.en: [Carter] I'm thinking he's lonely.
translation.fr: Je crois qu'il se sent seul.

translation.en: [Carter] What are we gonna name him?
[Frankie] Like there's even a reason to name him. Mom will never let us keep him.
translation.fr: Pas la peine de lui donner un nom.Maman voudra jamais le garder.

translation.en: [Carter] It's kind of like...
when Dad got sick, Mom did, too.
translation.fr: quand papa est tombé malade, maman aussi.

translation.en: [Frankie] I miss Dad, but I miss Mom even more.
translation.fr: Papa me manque,mais maman me manque encore plus.

translation.en: [Carter] I know, Fritter. I know.
[somber song playing] ♪ When the road gets dark ♪
♪ And you can no longer see ♪
translation.fr: Et que tu ne vois plus rien

translation.en: ♪ Just let my love throw a spark ♪
♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ When the tears you cry ♪
♪ Are all you can believe ♪
♪ Just give these lovin' arms a try Baby ♪
♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ And have a little faith in me ♪
♪ And when your back's against the wall ♪
translation.fr: Quand tu es dos au mur

translation.en: [man] Hey, dog!
♪ Just turn around and you will see ♪
♪ I will catch you I will catch your fall, baby ♪
translation.fr: Je serai là pour te rattraper

translation.en: ♪ Just have a little faith in me ♪
[Syd] Come on, what'd I tell you? Hear me, boy?
-We'll get out of here. -I don't wanna go anymore.
translation.fr: - On sort.- Je veux plus avancer.

translation.en: Look at my face. See how much I care?
Go on. Come on, Titus. Let's go.
Uh... What are we doing, man?
Listen. I know a guy, all right?
He's gonna buy our score and take us up river.
translation.fr: Il va acheter notre came et nous aider.

translation.en: [Titus] I mean, with them.
They're coming with us. Come on.
What are you saying?
Don't worry your pretty little head about it.
What y'all doing over there?
-Nothing. -Nothing.
Nothing.
-Ain't we clever? -[barking]
No, please. No.
-No, please, please. -Please. Please.
Let me be real clear...
I don't need but one of y'all to be my insurance policy. You hear me?
translation.fr: J'ai besoin que d'un seul gamincomme otage. Compris ?

translation.en: Get goin'. Go on.
Titus!
-Ms. Hughes... -I have to go find my kids.
translation.fr: - Mme Hughes...- Je vais les chercher.

translation.en: -Just give me a second. -I can't just sit here any longer.
translation.fr: - Attendez.- Je peux plus attendre sans rien faire.

translation.en: -I have to go. -You have to be rational.
translation.fr: - Je dois y aller.- Soyez rationnelle.

translation.en: Ms. Hughes! I have a lead.
What?
This van. It was stolen two days ago.
translation.fr: On a volé ce fourgon il y a deux jours.

translation.en: -And you think that they're in there? -Yeah.
It raced out of the quarter down towards the river.
translation.fr: Il a filé vers la rivière.

translation.en: That's right where the dog was taking us.
translation.fr: Là où le chien nous emmenait.

translation.en: -It's just a coincidence. -How is that a coincidence?
-Listen, the house was empty. -Maybe you didn't look hard enough.
translation.fr: - La maison était vide.- Vous n'avez pas assez cherché.

translation.en: You're talking as if you think a dog is smarter than the police.
translation.fr: Le chien serait plus malin que la police.

translation.en: I'm going back to the house.
We need to follow protocol this time!
Detective...
I don't think that dog was following any kind of protocol.
translation.fr: Je doute que le chien ait suiviune procédure.

translation.en: I think he was following his heart.
If anybody ask, I'm following the lead, all right?
translation.fr: Si on me cherche, je suis sur une piste.

translation.en: Don't you worry. I'm real good at not telling the police things.
translation.fr: Compris. Je suis très bonpour ne rien dire à la police.

translation.en: [Lyle] Ms. Hughes!
Boat's coming in, Syd.
[Syd] I'm on lookout. Flag him down. He's got the cash for the loot.
translation.fr: Je surveille. Fais-lui signe.Il a le liquide.

translation.en: There's our ride.
Stay.
Carter, I always pretend like I'm not scared,
translation.fr: Carter, je fais toujours semblantde pas avoir peur,

translation.en: but I'm really scared.
I'm really scared.
Please, God.
Please help us get back home.
Please, please, please.
This wasn't open before.
Are you sure?
I'm sure.
[Lyle] Oh, you got to be kidding me.
-[Whitney] What? What is that? -Hey, relax.
It's an underground transport tunnel,
built way back for things you don't even wanna know about.
translation.fr: construit il y a longtempspour de terribles raisons.

translation.en: -You think they went... Carter! Frankie! -What you doing?
translation.fr: - Ils... Carter ! Frankie !- Vous faites quoi ?

translation.en: -Those are my kids! -Relax. Listen. We can cut 'em off.
translation.fr: - Mes enfants !- Attendez. On peut leur couper la route.

translation.en: -There's a river. I'll make a call. Okay? -Okay.
translation.fr: Il y a une rivière.Je vais appeler du renfort.

translation.en: -Wait! Give me your keys. -Huh?
-I drive an ambulance for a living. -No.
No!
You call this driving?
Not yet.
[Carter] Benji! Help!
[Frankie] Help us!
[Carter] Help us, Benji! Help!
[man] Here's your money. We leave in five.
translation.fr: Voilà le fric. On part dans 5 minutes.

translation.en: You're not your brother.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas comme ton frère.

translation.en: My brother thinks I'm stupid.
He thinks he's the boss of me.
-But I can make decisions for myself. -Yeah.
translation.fr: - Mais je peux décider tout seul.- Oui.

translation.en: That's why I'm taking this here cash...
translation.fr: Alors je vais garder cet argent...

translation.en: all for me...
and bailin'...
so I don't never have to listen to another thing he says...
translation.fr: pour ne plus jamais avoir à l'écouter...

translation.en: never again.
Who's ugly now?
Hey, my man! Can you help us out? Have you seen these two kids?
A van? Anything out of the ordinary?
No, sir, I never seen 'em.
[Frankie faintly] Help! Help!
-That her dog? -Yeah. Whether she knows it or not.
translation.fr: - C'est son chien ?- Oui. Mais elle le sait pas.

translation.en: Okay, I'm requesting backup. I'm at the boatyard, right off...
translation.fr: J'ai besoin de renforts.Je suis au quai, à côté...

translation.en: -[growling] -It's a little late, you idiot.
Come on, I thought we was friends.
-Gotcha, slick. -[grunts]
You got the right to pretty much nothing.
translation.fr: Vous avez droit... à rien du tout.

translation.en: Benji!
[man] Cut the rope, idiot!
[pants] Don't you ever quit?
-[whimpers] -Benji!
You thought that dog was gonna save you?
translation.fr: Tu as cru que le chien te sauverait ?

translation.en: You're not going anywhere.
-Yeah, we are. -What are you gonna do, big man?
translation.fr: - Si.- Tu vas faire quoi, mon grand ?

translation.en: About time.
-Frankie, Carter! -Mommy!
Benji.
I love you, Benji.
Benji?
He didn't give up.
-Good boy. Good boy. -[Whitney] Benji.
-I love you. -I don’t have to say goodbye.
translation.fr: - Je t'aime.- Je n'ai pas à dire au revoir.

translation.en: -[Whitney] Thank God. -Thank you.
-Hi! -[all laughing]
[Syd] Get your hands off me.
[Lyle] Whoa, whoa, whoa. I got him. I got him.
Thank you.
This is going back where it belongs.
translation.fr: Elle retourne à qui de droit.

translation.en: Watch your head.
Hello.
Did good today. Good boy.
What you doing?
[chuckles] Oh, I had no idea.
You're a good girl. You're a very good girl.
[mouthing] Thank you.
[Carter] Good boy.
-[Frankie] I'm so glad you're back. -[Carter] We're keeping him, right?
translation.fr: - Je suis si contente.- On le garde ?

translation.en: -[Whitney sighs] I don't know. -Mom!
[Whitney] We're definitely keeping him.
[Frankie] We're gonna bake cookies and play dress up and you can help me with ballet.
translation.fr: On fera des gâteaux, on se déguisera,et tu m'aideras à danser.

translation.en: [Carter] Stop. You're scaring him.
